Action.author: jyellick
Action.body: This should be back ported to v1.0.x (as I attempted to indicate with the v1.0.5 fix version tag, and the v1.0.\{0,1,2,3,4} affects versions tags).

Action.author: denyeart
Action.body: Marking as Done. It will be picked up for inclusion in 1.0.5 based on the Fix Version.
